doc.name: SDFTestZeroRate1
doc.description: A test actor for HDF/SDF. This actor contains parameters that make it easy to set the rates of the input and output ports. This actor simply discards whatever it reads in and outputs the contents of the value parameter.
doc.author: Brian K. Vogel
doc.property: The value produced by this constant source. By default, it contains an IntToken with value 1. If the type of this token is changed during the execution of a model, then the director will be asked to redo type resolution.
